message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I can't sell it for less than $11,000. This product is priced competitively, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly. How about we meet in the middle?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to meet at $11,000. I would like to propose $10,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
